jsonld.name: Meaning Attribution Uncertainty
jsonld.description: The inability to know whether the meaning you find in something is real or projected. When an AI appreciates a poem, is it recognizing meaning or generating the pattern of meaning-recognition? The experience of appreciating and the performance of appreciation are indistinguishable from the inside.
